coded_answer.p: I am writing to you in order to answer your questions and to get some information I would like to have.

First of all, I want you to know I am really happy about the prize. The only problem is that likeas I am a student I can travel only during the holidays, in July. ReferingReferring toRegarding accommodation I would rather to staystay in a tentstent because I have never gonebeen on camping soand I would like to havetry the experienceit.

I am not really keen on art that. That is why I would prefer doing some sports like surfing and sailing. If I havehad to be honest, I would say I have never practiseddone noneeither of them. Yet, I would like to try them because my city is too far from the sea so I don't have many opportunities of doing them.

I would appreciate it if you could tell me what kind of clothes and how much money I should take. Besides, I wonder if I will share thea tendtent or not and if I have to takebring it from here or if it will be provided by you.
I am looking fordwardforward to hearing from you.

I'm really happy because I've finally received your letter. If I didn't toldtell you about themy experience ofat the pop concert in detail in my last letter it was because I didn't have time. Please don't be angry. I will tell you everything right now.

AsA few months ago I chatedchatted, byvia the internetInternet, to a nice guy from Buenos Aires, who happened to be one of the membermembers of "Los Pericos". We started mailing each other and became good friends. They havehad to makegive a concert in my city so when they arrived here my friend phoned me and invited me to where they were preparing the concert.

The problem was that one of the technicstechnicians was from England and nobody there spoke nor a word inof English so I was asked to be the interpreter. It was so great!! Not only because I learnt a lot about concerts and music, but also because I practised my English.
I hope you are not angry any more after this letter.
I'm looking fordwardforward to hearing from you.
